Plot: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.
Title: Forrest Gump
Actors: Tom Hanks, Rebecca Williams, Sally Field, Michael Conner Humphreys
tomatoConsensus: Forrest Gump may be an overly sentimental film with a somewhat problematic message, but its sweetness and charm are usually enough to approximate true depth and grace.
